name: Dice Bot Adventure
description:
A 3d Platformer in which you use Dice to upgrade your character and find your way out of an ancient Cave.

Game Created in 48 hours for GMTKJam 2022.
Theme was "Roll of the Dice"
Solo developed by Leander Burger

Game created in Unreal Engine 5
Using "StackOBot" template project
Using Dice model from Sketchfab
Using UI art from Kenney.nl

Instructions:
W,A,S,D - Move
SPACE - Jump
SPACE (In Air) - Jetpack
F - Roll Dice
Q - Open Stats

Gameplay Video
